name: Tyrogue
author: Mina Nakai
flavor_text: It is always bursting with energy. To make itself stronger, it keeps on fighting even if it loses.

abilities.name: Bratty Kick
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, put 3 damage counters on 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. If you use this Ability, your turn ends.
